comments:

my platform is RH7.3 .
Eclipse 3.0 requires a JDK 1.4 VM.  What VM are you using?

Also, do you have your workspace on a NFS-based location? If so,
this would be a duplicate of bug 44735.

Closing as duplicate of bug 44735. Please reopen if you believe your problem is
not the same.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 44735 ***

causedBy.message: Unable to create platform  lock file: /opt/eclipse3/workspace/.metadata/.lock.
